column3: Traffic;Kampong Cham:  At 10 pm on May 10
column5: 3 out of 11 people on baoard a passenger boat were missing after colliding with a fishing boat in the middle of the river in Koh Sampong commune
column6: Kampong Siem district. ------People aboard the boat were on their way back home to Kbal Koh Chey from a wedding party.  After hitting the fishing boat
column8: leaving three people missing and one injured.------After the incident
column9: the fishing side escaped the scene.------ AR------EY
